ticket.title: Slightly outdated installation instructions
ticket.original-body:
The instructions at http://rubyonrails.org/download suggest installing gems after ruby, however it seems that with 1.9.2, gems is automatically installed.
I'm a new user, so I wasn't aware of that, and trying to install gems separately resulted in an error.
I believe this change should be reflected so that new users can skip the gems installation step.

version.body-html:
The instructions at http://rubyonrails.org/download suggest installing gems after ruby, however it seems that with 1.9.2, gems is automatically installed.

I'm a new user, so I wasn't aware of that, and trying to install gems separately resulted in an error.

I believe this change should be reflected so that new users can skip the gems installation step.
version.title: Slightly outdated installation instructions

version.body: One of the things I have in common with the far more rich and famous Oprah Winfrey is a love of the nike shoes Free Run+ shoes. I began wearing them when they first debuted and my friend Carolyn praised them highly. nike sneaker are super flexible and meant to simulate barefoot walking. This supposedly helps strengthen your feet and ankles, nike air force 1 and as such I classify them as a toning dunks shoes.I've worn several versions of the nike dunk high Free Run shoes as my daily lifestyle shoe, air jordan 2011 good for shorter workouts of up to three miles. While I have friends who wear them on six mile walks (10K), I think they just don't have enough cushioning for going any further than that without beating up your feet.One other caution, air max shoes is notorious for a narrow toe box and these Nike air max 90 come in only one width.  My wide foot fit, but barely, Nike Air Griffey Max so I wore them without socks. They feel great without socks, but the basketball shoes quickly developed a terrible odor problem. Foot powder helped, and I can also recommend Stink Free lebron james shoes spray.
version.body-html: One of the things I have in common with the far more rich and famous Oprah Winfrey is a love of the nike shoes Free Run+ shoes. I began wearing them when they first debuted and my friend Carolyn praised them highly. nike sneaker are super flexible and meant to simulate barefoot walking. This supposedly helps strengthen your feet and ankles, nike air force 1 and as such I classify them as a toning dunks shoes.I've worn several versions of the nike dunk high Free Run shoes as my daily lifestyle shoe, air jordan 2011 good for shorter workouts of up to three miles. While I have friends who wear them on six mile walks (10K), I think they just don't have enough cushioning for going any further than that without beating up your feet.One other caution, air max shoes is notorious for a narrow toe box and these Nike air max 90 come in only one width.  My wide foot fit, but barely, Nike Air Griffey Max so I wore them without socks. They feel great without socks, but the basketball shoes quickly developed a terrible odor problem. Foot powder helped, and I can also recommend Stink Free lebron james shoes spray.
version.title: Slightly outdated installation instructions

version.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.
The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.
Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
version.body-html:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.

The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.

Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
